definition: half-moon/the 7th and 8th and 22nd and 23rd of the lunar month
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Explanation: On February 2nd, a first quarter Moon shone in planet Earth's early evening sky.
sentences.chinese: 2月2日，一輪上弦月閃爍在地球夜晚的天空中。

sentences.english: Visible on the upper right are the crescent Moon and the bright planet Venus.
sentences.chinese: 右上角可見弦月與一旁明亮的金星。

sentences.english: She looked ashamed ashamed stars, also forget the moon light leaning willow.
sentences.chinese: 她望羞了星星，也忘羞了上弦月輕倚柳梢頭。

sentences.english: The Moon full of Light in Conjunction with Mars, makes the Native to be counted a fool;
sentences.chinese: 火星與上弦月合相，命主會被人爲是傻瓜。

sentences.english: And there was the big 3)old moon, hanging right in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 掛在我眼前的，仍舊是那輪大大的下弦月。

sentences.english: And there was the big 3)old moon, true religion jeans for cheap, hanging right in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 掛在我面前的，仍然是那輪大大的下弦月。

sentences.english: Above the upper cornice are situated the lunettes.
sentences.chinese: 在上層檐口之上是弦月窗。

sentences.english: A first-quarter moon is halfway between new moon and full moon .
sentences.chinese: 上弦月是新月和滿月的中間狀態。

definition: bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
umber-black dye for painting the eyebrow
